signature.description: This is a digitally signed message part.

body.para: On January 8, 2011 04:06:07 pm Jakub Szypulka wrote:

quote.quotepara: HUNDRED PERCENT using opensource software! (minus camera firmware I suppose, haha)

body.para: what camera did you film it with / what format? and what software did you use to edit it? I am still stuck with SONY Vegas for my AVCHD videos, and must reboot into Windows to use it. Except for the times when I don't edit at all and I just transcode with ffmpeg. So I don't edit as much as I would like to (although: maybe that's just an excuse because I have no time to edit).

quote.quotepara: more than happy to have a short talk about the film at the next LGM. I would present my workflow as well as point out areas where improvement
